title: Pilcrow and Hedera Design
content:
Fellow typophiles,  
If any of you would recommend or give examples of particularly beautiful or interesting pilcrows and/or hederas, I'd be grateful.

I have searched the archives and found little. If this has been covered before, I apologise.

Thanks in advance.  
T
author: T Bones

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173216im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pilcrows_3761.gif)

The above are from my font [American Pi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173216/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/american-pi-nf/). Cheap, too...only ten bucks.
Mr. Bones, also check out the ornaments in Slimbach's faces--Poetica is particularly rich.
